title: nithya rupa
sahitya:
nitya rUpa evari pANDitya mEmi naDucurA



anupallavi



 satyamaina yajna mIra sAmarthyamu galadA



caraNam



 bhAnu pagalu rEyu ratna sAnu juTTadA pUni shESuDamita bhAra bhUmi mOyaDA 

vinulandu kAshIpati nI nAmamu balkadA mAni tyAgarAja vinuta mahimAspadamagu nImundu
